messages.title: Saving Lives has to be a priority
messages.content: Dr. Ali works in the NHS and is a frontline provider of healthcare. He knows all too well that only people on the 'coal face' can really say how badly the people of Stoke and Britain have been let down by Labour's meddling and interference in the system that we cherish as an institution

messages.title: The Lib Dem Difference
messages.content: Only the Liberal Democrats will protect front line NHS services and put more police on the beat. We'll also restore the pensions' 'earning link' and provide fair pay for our armed forces. And we've costed plan to do it. That’s the a Lib Dem difference.

messages.title: Gordon Brown’s record of shame
messages.content:
• Wrote the cheques for the Iraq War
• Raised taxes on lower paid
• Closed thousands of local post offices
• Dithered over taking action on MPs’ expenses

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protect front line NHS services, and take action to make Britain fairer by giving them support to be the next local MP.
Put more police on the beat.
Provide fair pay for our armed forces.

mentions.candidate: Dr. Ali works in the NHS
mentions.partyLeader: Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats are winning support across Britain.

leaflet.personalStatement: Saving Lives has to be a priority

quotes.text: The NHS is safer in the hands of professionals
Spending squeeze for NHS despite Darling’s promise

images.caption: The NHS is safer in the hands of professionals.
